description: Record an experience memory capturing situation, actions, reasoning, outcomes, and confidence. Use for lessons, playbooks, or transferable know-how.
name: addExperienceMemory

summary.description: Concise overview of this specific memory

tags.description: Model generated tags that summarize the experience facets

action.description: Narrative describing actions taken or behaviors exhibited

keyLearning.description: Narrative describing key insights or lessons learned

knowledgeValueScore.description: Numeric score (0-1) describing how reusable and shareable this experience is

labels.description: Model generated tags that summarize the experience facets

possibleOutcome.description: Narrative describing potential outcomes or learnings

problemSolvingScore.description: Numeric score (0-1) describing how effectively the problem was solved

reasoning.description: Narrative describing the thought process or motivations

scoreConfidence.description: Numeric score (0-1 (0% to 100%)) describing confidence in the experience details

situation.description: Narrative describing the situation or event
